 1997-17431997-11-270HRDC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the OLD AGE SECURITY REGULATIONS by allowing a sponsored elderly immigrant, if their sponsorship breaks down in exceptional circumstances, to receive the same pro-rated Guaranteed Income Supplement or Spouse's Allowance as others who qualify for benefits under an International Social Security Agreement.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0530 Publication Date: 1997-12-10
